metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5205 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When using incomplete escape codes, Irssi before 1.0.6 may access data beyond the end of the string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.6').
